ygData.subject: Re: Lens Quest from Akanon in Library
ygData.msgSnippet: you may have the quest mixed up, there are 2 separate quests, involving the lenses, 1 in which you will get the observers staff,  don t be confused on the
ygData.messageBody:
you may have the quest mixed up, there are 2 separate quests, involving the
lenses, 1 in which you will get the observers staff, don't be confused on
the quests and make sure you are following the right one,

Danek HealFast
Leader of the Black Moon
41 druid
Mithaniel Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Ben Pocock <bpocock@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:58 PM
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Lens Quest from Akanon in Library


> From: bpocock@... (Ben Pocock)
>
> OK, I got a lens quest in Akanon. I had to find the four observatories
> and get the spare lens from them. One had it stolen from a dark elf
> rogue, and I have promptly taken it back. One was with some gnome who
> was captured by slavers in the mino caves. I'm sure I can get that one
> back. The other two say to me "Sorry, I have no spare lens, come back
> in a few weeks". Can you actually get them to give you spare lens, or
> do you simply have to repeatedly get lens from the other places (as
> they are stackable).
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has over 150,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
